Class TextPageable

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.wubiq.wrappers.TextPageable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.print.Pageable, java.io.Serializable

    public class TextPageable
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.awt.print.Pageable
    All values are saved in twips (inch * 1440).
    Author:
    Federico Alcantara
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
